# description

**Instance Property**

A mirror that reflects the filled column.

## Declaration

```swift
var description: String { get }
```

## Describing a Column

- **debugDescription**: A text representation of the filled column suitable for debugging.
- **description(options:)**: Generates a string description of the filled column.

items.description: A text representation of the filled column suitable for debugging.
items.name: debugDescription

items.description: Generates a string description of the filled column.
items.name: description(options:)

title: description
